channel.title: Ffs -.-
channel.description:
Don't you love it when you wake up in the morning, just to find that your fort has been greifed to fuck? [IMG]http://imageupload.org/?di=1512969186233[/img]
Also sorry to say it but i'd say this was done by somone with quite high command privlages because this tree wasn't there before... [IMG]http://imageupload.org/?di=912969188470[/img] and i thought only admins can spawn 'bigtrees' with /bigtree or at least that's a command i've used on my server..
Anyway, onto my main point....
Could we please consider a whitelist with a topic for people requesting their name to be put onto the whitelist... it'd stop geifers or allow admins to deal with greifers faster at least.
Lon

item.title: Ffs -.-
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

[quote=“ytuio9, post:19, topic:381315”][quote author=drubrkletern link=topic=477127.msg3491315#msg3491315 date=1296952504]

Obviously, place dirt on tree, grow another tree… doesn’t need and street smarts??
apparently it does…

Nope.

Just called it a lol tree

[/quote]
Right so he magically placed a sapling on leaves.
I call bullshit

OT: Lon if you need any help fixing up the damage, I’ll help[/quote]

But i just found it like that so w/e

Read full topic
